DOC.brief_summary: Randomized control trial ( RCT ) test hypothesis vitrification superior slow freezing .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Vitrification Versus Slow Freezing Day 3 : Randomised Controlled Trial .
DOC.criteria: Patients ( female age < 40 year ) Patients undergo 1st oocyte retrieval IVF/Intracytoplasmatic Sperm Injection ( ICSI ) treatment Patients plan embryo transfer day 3 . Patients supernumerary embryos sufficient quality freezing/vitrifying day 3 . Fresh personal ( oocyte ) One inclusion study per patient . Patients undergo 2nd high rank oocyte retrieval fresh cycle fail pregnancy .
